labels.alwaysOpen: I'm always open to new opportunities and collaborations. Feel free to reach out through any of the channels below!

hero.title: Hi, I'm Farrukh
hero.subtitle: Full-stack developer passionate about creating clean, scalable web applications using modern technologies. I deliver high-quality solutions for both frontend and backend challenges.

projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.description: Personal portfolio built with Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and TypeScript. Features dark/light mode toggle, glassmorphism design, liquid glass effects, and fully responsive layouts.

projects.name: E-commerce Platform
projects.description: Full-stack e-commerce application with Node.js backend, React frontend, and MongoDB database. Includes user authentication, shopping cart functionality, and payment integration.

projects.name: Blog Application
projects.description: MERN stack blog platform with user authentication, post management, comment system, and real-time notifications. Built with modern web development best practices.
